result.longName: Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim A.S.
result.prevName: Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim Anonim Sirketi

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim A.S. operates in the paint and hardware markets in Turkey. The company provides metal varnishes, insulating materials, powder paints, gilding paints, wallpaper glues, paint covers, silicones, brush and roller group products, and spray paints and sanders, as well as floor and surface cleaners; and iron oxide powder paints, abrasives, marine and yacht paints, toxic paints, optima glues, technological paint application systems, construction paints, and isolation materials. It markets and sells its products under the Beeck, Beeck SP Plus, Bondex, Green Lack, Pozzi-Colors, Nu-Guard AG, Incralac, and Aries brands. The company was formerly known as Uzer Koll. Sti. and changed its name to Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim Anonim Sirketi in 1972. Uzertas Boya Sanayi Ticaret ve Yatirim A.S. was founded in 1962 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
